title: HeartLess
lyrics:
Voicemail is full
Glass is half empty, I want you bad
I want it that bad
I get what I want
But maybe I shouldn't 'cause that would be bad

That would be so bad



One, two, three, four, five, too many times

I've been down this road too many nights

So next time



I should use my heart

I should use my heart

I should use my heart less

Use my heart

I should use my heart

I should use my heart less, no



Should kiss you goodbye

Maybe I shouldn't, not when it's good

Not when it's this good



And I never learn

So maybe it's my fault, I always love

I love you too hard



One, two, three, four, five, too many times

I've been down this road too many nights

So next time



I should use my heart

I should use my heart

I should use my heart less

Use my heart

I should use my heart

I should use my heart less, no

(I should use my heart less)



Voicemail is full

Glass is half empty, I want you bad

I want it that bad



I should use my heart

I should use my heart

I should use my heart less

Use my heart

I should use my heart

I should use my heart less, no

(I should use my heart less)
